GSD.description:
clk: qcom: ipq8074: dont disable gcc_sleep_clk_src

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 459411b9f0180e3f382d7abfa3028dd3285984c3. For more details please see the references link.
